page.title: 08MADLEY VILLAGE
page.content: Madley is a parish and village on the B4352 Hereford to Hay road. It is 6.5 miles west from Hereford. Madley is in the South Herefordshire District Council - "The Rural West". Population in 1977 was 969. After the 1939/45 war the small settlements of Madley grew and this was mainly due to fairly substantial local authority developements. Housing Stock - 360 Development since 1970 is 42 private units and 35 public units. The average household size is 3.14 (Persons). House prices start at Â£16500 with the average price being Â£31665. The average income is 10% lower than the county average and 17.5% lower than the national average.
